entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming north 50 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
